    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static int
    MapEditor.addContinent(String p_continentId, int p_continentvalue, Connectivity p_connectivity)
    This method is used to add continent to the user defined maps.
    static int
    MapEditor.addCountry(String p_countryId, String p_continentId, Connectivity p_connectivity)
    This method is used to add country to the user defined maps.
    static int
    MapEditor.addNeighbour(int p_countryId, int p_neighbourcountryId, Connectivity p_connectivity)
    This method is used to add neighbouring countries to the owned countries to the user defined maps.
    static void
    MapLoader.loadMap(Connectivity p_connectivity, String p_mapName)
    This method is used to load the Map selected by the user whether pre-defined or user made.
    static int
    MapEditor.removeContinent(String p_continentId, Connectivity p_connectivity)
    This method is used to remove continent to the user defined maps.
    static int
    MapEditor.removeCountry(String p_countryId, Connectivity p_connectivity)
    This method is used to remove country to the user defined maps.
    static int
    MapEditor.removeNeighbour(int p_countryId, int p_neighbourcountryId, Connectivity p_connectivity)
    This method is used to remove neighbouring countries to the owned countries to the user defined maps.
    static void
    SaveMap.saveMap(Connectivity p_connectivity)
    This method is used to save the map once user creates a new map or make changes to the existing ones.
